heading: next time, ask
subheading: under questioning by congress tuesday as to why negotiations continue to drag on with china over its entry into the world trade organization, us trade representative charlene barshefsky didn't mince words. "men never ask for directions, and we mistakenly bombed the chinese embassy in belgrade." ouch.
author: wired staff
text: under questioning by congress tuesday as to why negotiations continue to drag on with china over its entry into the world trade organization, us trade representative charlene barshefsky didn't mince words.
